column5: In 2021, the financial services sector contributed £173.6 billion to the UK economy, 8.3% of total economic output (The House of Commons Library, 2022).This MSc Business with Financial Management programme will provide you with the essential business knowledge, personal skills, and financial insight needed for a wide variety of roles in business and finance. The aim of this course is to not only enable you to specialist in financial management, but also to develop skills which are highly sought after by employers.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
